data.name: Quadratic Equation Solver
data.description:
Hi! Please rank this kata to get it out of beta! Sorry if my English is bad.

This is the Python version of this kata. (as of Apr 7 2022)

Link is here: https://www.codewars.com/kata/58077d541dd451e0d80008dd

You are given a quadratic equation ax^2+bx+c written in that format where a, b, and c are all non-zero and real. If the cooefficent is 1 or -1, it will just appear as "x" or "-x"

Just return all the real roots (x) rounded to the nearest hundredth in a sorted list.


e.g.   ```-x^2+2x+3```        ``` [-1, 3]```      

e.g.   ```-132x^2-x+133```     ```[-1.01, 1]```   

e.g.   ```4x^2-12x+9```        ```[1.5]```  

Look in the Sample Tests for more examples
